Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Antineoplastic Agent/Pyruvate Kinase Inhibitor TLN-232,/NCIThesaurus/Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Enzyme Inhibitor/Pyruvate Kinase Inhibitor TLN-232
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A synthetic cyclic heptapeptide with potential antineoplastic activity. Pyruvate kinase (PK) inhibitor TLN-232 targets pyruvate kinase M2 (M2PK), which may disrupt tumor cell anaerobic glycolysis. M2PK is a dimeric isoform of PK and the predominant PK isoform found in tumor cells
